properties.description: Copying data from One Blob to Another
pipeline with a copy activity that copies the entire data from the source data store (Azure SQL Database) to the destination data store (Azure Blob Storage)

activities.name: LookupTableList
activities.description: Retrieve the table list from Azure SQL database

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'SalesLT' and TABLE_NAME <> 'ProductModel'

activities.name: IncrementalCopyActivity
activities.description: This activity copies the data between last change tracking version and the current change tracking version to the destination data store.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select data_source_table.PersonID,data_source_table.Name,data_source_table.Age, CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from data_source_table RIGHT OUTER JOIN CHANGETABLE(CHANGES data_source_table, @{activity('LookupLastChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION}) as CT on data_source_table.PersonID = CT.PersonID where CT.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION <= @{activity('LookupCurrentChangeTrackingVersionActivity').output.firstRow.CurrentChangeTrackingVersion}

activities.name: StoredProceduretoUpdateChangeTrackingActivity
activities.description: This activity updates the change tracking version in the table_store_ChangeTracking_version table.

properties.description: IterateAndCopySQLTables - pipeline takes a list of tables as a parameter. For each table in the list, it copies data from the table in Azure SQL Database to Azure Synapse Analytics (formerly SQL DW) using staged copy and PolyBase.
Time Partitioned Delta Copy From Blob Pipeline
AzureSqlDatabaseLinkedService created for change tracking scenario
AzureStorageLinkedService created for Change Tracking scenario

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies
Movies derive(year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),
		title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6))) ~> MoviesYear
MoviesYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Output

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		RottenTomato as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesDB
MoviesDB filter(toInteger(year) >= 1910 && toInteger(year) <= 2000 && rlike(genres, 'Comedy')) ~> FilterYears
FilterYears aggregate(groupBy(year),
	AggregateComedyRatings = avg(toInteger(Rating))) ~> AggregateComedyRating
AggregateComedyRating sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink
